data.body:
says Ready For Shipment has no skill

if this is true, add a skill similar to the others.

the skill is basically:

see if code is commited to main, if so, `kno next`
see if code is committed to branch, if so, merge to main, then `kno next`
look for committed code referencing the problem or the knot/bead.  if found, go back to step 1 (see if code is committed to main, etc.)
if not, roll back to ready for implementation.
data.title: beat e4df throws error when Take! selected
